# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5), boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0), and offshore pumps at various positions including (x=-7.5, y=25.5), (x=-18.5, y=27.5), (x=-16.5, y=26.5), (x=-13.5, y=26.5), (x=-3.5, y=27.5), (x=-1.5, y=28.5), (x=0.5, y=30.5), and (x=1.5, y=32.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory structure found.

### Water supply system
Consists of offshore pumps at various positions including (x=-7.5, y=25.5), (x=-18.5, y=27.5), (x=-16.5, y=26.5), (x=-13.5, y=26.5), (x=-3.5, y=27.5), (x=-1.5, y=28.5), (x=0.5, y=30.5), and (x=1.5, y=32.5), and pipe groups at positions (x=-5.5, y=-8.5), (x=3.5, y=-2.5), (x=-20.5, y=25.5), (x=-12.5, y=25.5), and (x=-5.5, y=25.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are not blocked by other objects or entities before attempting to connect them.
- Verify that the entities are compatible and can be connected.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Make sure that offshore pumps are connected to a fluid system and have a valid fluid input.
- Ensure that offshore pumps are not blocked by other objects or entities.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that boilers have a valid fuel source and are not out of fuel.
- Verify that boilers are connected to a fluid system and have a valid fluid input.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network and have a valid input liquid.
- Verify that steam engines are not blocked by other objects or entities.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the target tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
- Verify that the entity can be placed at the target position.
